attributes.action: Make Clint Eastwood  a Knight of the Realm Now!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Clint Eastwood Actor, Philathropist, and Musicians, is  approaching the age of eighty. he has spent the last 4 dacades or so entertaining us all. He is important to Millions of young  and middle age people in our country and around the world.He had contributed  and enrich our lives greatly.

 We should show our appreciation to this great American and World Icon. We must not let him die(like john Wayne) before we honour him.

So arise Sir Clint Eastwood...

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
